page.title: 17HOME LIFE MOVING FERNDOWN
page.content: My family have just moved into a bigger house in Ferndown because my Dad has a job here. The weather is better than it was in Solihull and I enjoy living near the sea. There are plenty of activities at the{sports {centre}which is within easy walking distance from my home. I used to be at a{Junior school}which took children ages 7-11, but here at{Ferndown {Middle School}the children start at 9 and leave at 13. There are about 190 children in the first year of our school. Of these, 32 have moved to{Ferndown}within the last two years. Two have come from abroad, {America}and{Germany,}but the others were in England, for example,{Suffolk, {Kent, Essex}and{Wiltshire.}About half moved because their fathers had new jobs and the other half for better housing.
